Articles.Content: Just got a maker bot 5th generation 3d printer and I am wondering if there is any software out there that would let me turn a ship from ksp into an .stl file that I could use and 3d print with. I've seen individual parts and a few models on thingiverse but I would still like to make a ship of my very own. Any suggestions?
Well, there's a .mbm (or .mu, I always forget) to .blend converter floating around somewhere, just stick the models together in blender and save it as a .stl file.

yeah, don't worry about the craft file that's completely useless for 3d printing

Bring all the .mu's for all the parts the craft is made out of into blender, assemble them like a craft and export that.
